channel.title: Just bought a .com domain
channel.description: I tried using word-press to build my site, however after installing it, i click the link and it doesn't find the site? I think i have to point my website to the DNS or something like that, help would be much appreciated!

item.title: Just bought a .com domain
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

You have to give your domain registrar the whatever DNS servers you are using, generally given to you by your hosting company either in the control panel, or in the email you received about your hosting being set up and what not.

You could also try, temporarily:
<my_user_name>.<my_hosting_company>.<w/e>

Read full topic
